In England, in the seven days to 18 February, there were 241,228 new confirmed cases (426.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 February, there were 336,645 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 28% (95,417 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 February is 15,947,871 (28,201.3 cases per 100,000 population).
